flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
my day at art and stuff started when i thought i was realy realy late for the start i had looked at the ict 6 or science 6 but no one was there when i went back to drama building there were people walking into the building so i decided to go in there my self and i found that everyone'''bold text''' and then there was the speach introduction thingy and then we went of to ict 6 to make some videos' mine was about random things mostly made up of fail gifs (gifs are basicaly animated pictures)

with the song concord dawn man for all seasons, and if you type the channel name amery word art i can't remember if there are any spaces.

and you should find our videos there if not then we still have problams loading them up if you have any ideas on how to load them up send your ideas to harvey.watt@yahoo.co.uk we had made the videos using windows movie maker after we had done the movies at the end of the week we had a party consisting of fizzy drinks, chocolate, sweets so not too bad and crisps and we watched all the videos and people won prizes so all in all i had a good time. =P
